document_title: Premenopausal menorrhagia: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
Doctor Nguyen Duc Hinh emphasized that women need to pay attention to the following symptoms for early examination and timely treatment, avoiding the disease from progressing seriously, making treatment difficult and expensive. Include:
Severe abdominal pain, sudden pain in the lower abdomen on menstruation days;; Abnormal vaginal bleeding, not during the menstrual cycle;; The private area is itchy and causes discomfort;; There is a lot of vaginal discharge, the vaginal discharge is darker than normal with an unpleasant odor.
subsection_title: rong kinh tien man kinh.json. When to see a doctor?
